mapper.select: SELECT c.cat_name, c.cat_image, u.user_id, p.post_like, p.post_unlike, p.post_image, p.post_content, TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute, p.post_time, NOW()) AS post_time, p.post_no FROM cat c, post p, user u WHERE c.cat_no=p.cat_no AND p.user_no=u.user_no AND c.cat_no in ( SELECT cat_no FROM following_cat WHERE follower_no=#{follower_no}) ORDER BY p.post_time DESC;
